remarks.para: May be inoperative provided an accepted procedure is used to ensure that oxygen supply is above minimum required for flight.

note.para: The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:

numlitem.para: Ensure that the average pressure reading on the passenger/supernumerary oxygen cylinder gauge(s) meet dispatch requirement pressure.

placard.para: Placard below Captain’s PFD on P-1-1 panel: "PASS/SUPERNUMERARY OXYGEN PRESS IND SYS INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

note.para: The repetitive inspection required when this item is inoperative must be documented in the Aircraft Logbook at the prescribed intervals. (Refer to GMM, Chapter 3, Section 6.)

numlitem.para: Ensure that the average pressure reading on the crew oxygen cylinder gauge(s) meet dispatch requirement pressure.
